bibl.title: Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece. (Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. 26.)
bibl.note: 13 papers presented at a conference organized by the Center for the Ancient Mediterranean at Columbia University on October 11th and 12th, 2002. - Pp. vii-ix: W.V.H. and G.R., Preface; - 269-289: Bibliography; - 291-294: Index of Subjects; - 295-296: Index of Papyri.
HARRIS William V. and Giovanni RUFFINI (Edd.), Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece. (Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. 26.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2004, 8°, xx-296 pp., tabl., graphiques, 3 cartes et 30 pll. ISBN 90-04-14105-7. €75.
